title: Slow cooker fusion pork curry
ingredients: ['500g diced pork', '2 potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks', 'oil for frying', '4 medium or 6 small onions, quartered', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon garam masala', '1 knob butter', '2 cardamom pods', '42g medium madras curry powder', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '8 tablespoons frozen petit pois', 'good handful cauliflower florets', '2 eggs, hard boiled and halved']
